note.snippet: , bhikkhave, dhammehi samannāgato āvāsiko bhikkhu abhāvanīyo hoti. Katamehi pañcahi? Na ākappasampanno hoti na vattasampanno; na bahussuto hoti na sutadharo; na paṭisallekhitā
, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannāgato āvāsiko bhikkhu gihīnaṃ
samannāgato āvāsiko bhikkhu yathābhataṃ nikkhitto evaṃ niraye. Katamehi pañcahi? Āvāsamaccharī hoti; kulamaccharī hoti; lābhamaccharī hoti; vaṇṇamaccharī

note.original: yathābhataṃ cāpi avaṇṇagedhā, catukkamacchera pañcamena cāti (sī. syā.) yathābhataṃ avaṇṇañca, catuko macchariyena cāti (ka.)

alternatives.alternative: yathābhataṃ cāpi avaṇṇagedhā, catukkamacchera pañcamena cāti
yathābhataṃ cāpi avaṇṇagedhā, catukkamacchera pañcamena cāti
